name: ALIANZA 4-UNIVERSIDADES
membership: Alianza 4-Unniversidades is a member of YERUN (Young European Research University Network) https://yerun.eu/
goal: ALIANZA 4-UNIVERSIDADES is a strategic association of four leading universities from Madrid and Barcelona committed to the progress of science, dissemination of culture and development of society. Their main aim is to cooperate in a) academic careers and mobility; b) research and teaching projects in the European Research Area; c) enhance and strengthen international relations.
interests: Budget, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Youth
euInitiatives:
- European Research Area
- Mondernisation of Higher Education
- Implementation of Horizon 2020 and Erasmus+
- Open Science, Open Innovation, Open to the World
- Entrepreneurship
- Innovation
- Digital Single Market
